imgDesc.text:
Can receive energy from Xenochromatic Ball Octopuses and convert it into <color=#ffe14b>stored</color> energy that can then be fired in the direction a character is facing when the energy flow is interrupted.
The Potential Energy Orb challenges usually exist alongside <color=#ffe14b>golden signs</color> that can detect the presence of characters. Only when a character stands next to the golden sign will the <color=#ffe14b>targeting reticle</color> for the Potential Energy Orb appear.
